thread.title: struts for Brandon Maxwell NYFW show
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid struts for Brandon Maxwell NYFW show | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: struts for Brandon Maxwell NYFW show

organizations.name: brandon maxwell's new york fashion week

text:
Bella Hadid 's body is one to envy—and the message could not have been clearer at New York Fashion Week.
The supermodel hit the catwalk on Tuesday for Brandon Maxwell’s fall ’17 presentation in an alluring dress black dress that left little to hide of her enviable figure.
With slits cut from the top, bottom and side, the knockout strutted confidently down the runway, calling particular attention to her legs and bust.
Curves ahead! Bella Hadid highlighted her enviable body on Tuesday at Brandon Maxwell's New York Fashion Week fall '17 presentation
Peek-a-boob! The supermodel's flirty LBD left little to the imagination
Take it to the maxi in a dress by Brandon Maxwell Brandon Maxwell AW17
Shop the current collection at Harvey Nichols
Buy now
Bella Hadid is the queen of New York Fashion Week this season.
Not only did the model close Oscar de la Renta's show but she stalked down the runway for Brandon Maxwell yesterday too in this super sexy gown that we'll be sure to see on a red carpet one day soon.
A black floor length dress will never let you down at a formal event. It's timeless, elegant and if it's this particular number it's got a little edge too. The halter neck creates a plunging neckline while that thigh high split shows off acres of skin.
The AW17 collection won't be available for a few months, of course, so why not click (right) to shop the current line now at Harvey Nichols? Or head to our edit below where you'll find some maxi dresses you can get your paws on straight away.
Boohoo, Missguided and Asos have got bargain buys or go luxe with Animale at Revolve.
 ONE LIKE IT £28 Asos maxi dress with thigh high split
Buy now
£673.65 Animale plunging thigh high split maxi dress at Revolve
Buy now
£35 Missguided thigh high split maxi dress
Buy now
£20 Boohoo maxi dress with halter neck and thigh high split
Buy now
The brunette's stunning gown from the fashion house featured an asymmetric floor-length hem that was cut to the top of her thigh. The chic number incorporated a halter-style bodice and plunging neckline.
More skin was on show from the side, where the halter silhouette revealed her toned midsection and bosom.
The flirty look was completed with simple strappy sandals, and her slicked-back hairstyle emphasized her dramatic eyeliner.
Legs for days! The knockout's legs were on display with a slit cut to the thigh
The 20-year-old is a rising star in the modelling world, closing the Oscar de la Renta show one night earlier.
For Brandon Maxwell’s show, she likely picked up some cues from the experienced supermodels who also hit the catwalk, including Joan Smalls, 28, who paraded her legs in a longsleeve mini-dress that had a pleated, flared skirt. And Jourdan Dunn, 26, who rocked a semi-sheer top teamed with a dramatic, voluminous skirt with a slit up to the thigh.
They were joined on the runway by their fellow Victoria's Secret Angels, Romee Strijd, 20, who showcased a floor-length one-shoulder dress, and Taylor Hill, also 20, who presented an oversized dress that had a full-length zipper up the front.
Small on Smalls: Joan Smalls showed lots of legs on the runway
Catwalk queen: Joan paraded her legs in a longsleeve mini-dress that had a pleated, flared skirt
Drama: Jourdan rocked a semi-sheer top teamed with a dramatic, voluminous skirt with a slit up to the thigh.
Leggy ladies: Many of the models strutted down the catwalk in alluring ensembles
Model behavior: The knockouts had dramatic eyeliner and slicked back hair
